Body: I have Samsung Galaxy Pop SHV-E220S (LTE with 2GB RAM, 8GB ROM, Quad Core processor etc.) upgraded to Android 4.4.4 through Kies, rooted and want a custom ROM (like CM11/12 or MIUI etc. yet failed to find one) because it is occupying more than 4GB for its system to run and have much bloatware, some I have uninstalled but various I can't recognize which have name like com.abc.xyz etc. its specs are much like Samsung Galaxy S3 i9305 but some are different.where I can find a suitable custom ROM for my device, can somebody help me?
Title: Custom ROM for my device SHV-E220S

history.Text: I have Samsung Galaxy Pop SHV-E220S (LTE with 2GB RAM, 8GB ROM, Quad Core processor etc.) upgraded to Android 4.4.4 through Kies, rooted and want a custom ROM (like CM11/12 or MIUI etc. yet failed to find one) because it is occupying more than 4GB for its system to run and have much bloatware, some I have uninstalled but various I can't recognize which have name like com.abc.xyz etc. its specs are much like Samsung Galaxy S3 i9305 but some are different.where I can find a suitable custom ROM for my device, can somebody help me?
